name: Conjunto Legen
description:
Conjunto Legen is a short 1-bit puzzle-platformer, you need to solve puzzles by spending points on the right movements! Made for the Nokia 3310 jam 3, the theme was On/Off!

Use the cards to move, but you have only limited moves free. Turn different movements on and off, increase the amount to move faster and reach the end!

Controls
  • Choose Card = Left arrow/Right arrow
  • Increase/Decrease Amount = Up arrow/Down arrow
  • Start Movement = Enter
  • Restart Level = R

Made by
